Row.Text: One of the strongest viruses created by Mir, this creature is a dark version of Shurelia's own ELMA guardian, capable of brainwashing them and causing severe havoc throughout the Tower.

ELMA-DS is the unique Jacqlian replacement for the Rifleman. It carries the Virus promotion, allowing it to capture the defeated enemy units. It also carries the Blitz promotion, allowing it attack twice in a single turn, making it a deadly fighting force.
Begins with the Blitz promotion, can capture enemy units.
